channel.title: Conflict on Hajin Lim
channel.description: Recent content in Conflict on Hajin Lim

item.title: Now here or nowhere
item.description: Summary This research explores the uses of communication channels that couples adopt in varied geographical distance settings. We also characterize their conflict patterns and strategies for resolving the conflicts. We found that the distances between couples have a strong influence on their communication patterns. The distance is associated with typical conflicts pattern that couples confronted as well as the relationship maintenance strategies. In this research, we classify distance settings into four categories.
